attributes.action: Call for the release Tarequ Zia (son of the former Priminster of Bangladesh, Ms Khaleda Zia)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to call for the release of Tarequ Zia (son of the former Prime Minster of Bangladesh, Ms Khaleda Zia)' Medical experts in Bangladesh have confirmed if Tareq Rahman does not receive superior treatment immediately he will become paralyzed permanently and his life is uncertain. This man is helpless in his own country because he is so popular.  We lodge this petition is to express our opposition to the current Bangladesh Government anti humanitarian activities and calls for the international community to do more to protect and save the political figures such as popular leader Tareq Rahman.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
